The Nexus 6 and the Nexus 9 will be the first mobile devices to run Android 5.0,...
...which as of today will also be known as "Lollipop."
The Nexus 6, developed in partnership with Motorola,...
...has a contoured aluminum frame and a 13-megapixel camera.
It also comes with a turbocharger which lets you charge the phone for just 15 minutes...
...and walk away with six hours of battery life.
The Nexus 9 meanwhile was developed in partnership with HTC.
This is a midsize tablet that you can buy with an attachable keyboard folio.
